attributes.action: A vaccine must be close to ready before schools and businesses begin to open
attributes.additional_details: Also i am particularly concerned about opening schools next month, the public’s health is one of the most important things that the government should be focusing on and this sounds like the government are starting not to care about the public’s health.
attributes.background: The government should not allow schools and the minority of businesses to open before a vaccine is close to ready as this may cause another peak which is exactly what the government do not want to happen.
